field.name: accessibilityProperties
field.description:
Workaround to provide a DisplayObject interface

Vote for Adobe to improve AS3 by adding a DisplayObject interface here:
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/ASL-45

This allows us to work with implentations as assuming they are DisplayObjects. Please note that there is no guarantee that they actually are. It's up to implementations to ensure they inherit from DisplayObject

Furthermore, you will still have to cast implementations to DisplayObject to add them to other DisplayObjectContainers
field.shortDescription:
Workaround to provide a DisplayObject interface

Vote for Adobe to improve AS3 by adding a DisplayObject interface here:
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/ASL-45

This allows us to work with implentations as assuming they are DisplayObjects.

asClass.name: UIControl
asClass.description:
UIControl Abstract Superclass for UIControls

UIControls are intended to be AS3 UI components that contain a visual asset and some code to control the interaction

assets can either be already attached to some parent, which may be convenient if creating layouts in the Flash IDE, or can be supplied as a new unattached instance.

The UIControl is a display object too, so it will attach the asset content and then (if the child was already attached) add itself in place of the asset.

This gives us the best of both worlds; visual assets that are free of any code references, but code assets that are part of the display list and can access stage properties, display list events etc.
asClass.shortDescription:
UIControl Abstract Superclass for UIControls

UIControls are intended to be AS3 UI components that contain a visual asset and some code to control the interaction

assets can either be already attached to some parent, which may be convenient if creating layouts in the Flash IDE, or can be supplied as a new unattached instance.

The UIControl is a display object too, so it will attach the asset content and then (if the child was already attached) add itself in place of the asset.

This gives us the best of both worlds; visual assets that are free of any code references, but code assets that are part of the display list and can access stage properties, display list events etc.
asClass.author: Derek McKenna

constructor.name: UIControl
constructor.description:
Constructor

if content is already attached to a parent the UIControl will attach itself in place and add the asset as it's child
constructor.shortDescription:
Constructor

if content is already attached to a parent the UIControl will attach itself in place and add the asset as it's child

method.name: addDraggerListener
method.shortDescription: add a listener to all Dragger events

method.name: removeDraggerListener
method.shortDescription: remove a listener from all Dragger events

param.name: dragRect
param.description: Rectangle containing slider bounds - note dimension opposite to axis will be ignored

param.name: buttonMode
param.description: Boolean indicating whether or not use buttonMode on the dragger

param.name: startingPercent
param.description: Number initial dragger position as a percentage between min and max

param.name: track
param.description: MovieClip optional element to use as clickable track element that will reposition slider

param.name: axis
param.description: String either 'x' or 'y' to use as the axis of dragging

method.name: setDragRect
method.description:
set the bounds of the slider
note dimensions opposite to axis will be ignored
method.shortDescription:
set the bounds of the slider
note dimensions opposite to axis will be ignored

param.name: rect
param.description: Rectangle containing min and max slider postions

asClass.name: IDraggerListener
asClass.description:
DraggerListener

Classes wishing to listen to all Dragger events via the Dragger.addDraggerListener method should implement this
asClass.shortDescription:
DraggerListener

Classes wishing to listen to all Dragger events via the Dragger.addDraggerListener method should implement this
asClass.author: Derek McKenna

asClass.name: Dragger
asClass.description: BasicDragger Abstracts dragging functionality and provides and event system for the following events: dragging starts; dragged asset changes; dragging ends. see com.dezza.ricepaper.ui.dragger.DraggerEvent
asClass.author: Derek McKenna

param.name: buttonMode
param.description: Boolean true to use button cursor (default true)

asClass.name: LabelButton
asClass.author: derek Extends Button by adding a TextField label property

field.name: mouseStateLocked
field.shortDescription: get whether or not the mouse state is currently locked

method.name: autoAddHitArea
method.shortDescription:
automatically create a hit area

usefull for text only or other assets that have irregular edges.

Note: uses the bounds of the asset at the time called and doesn't take into account any masks etc

asClass.name: ButtonState
asClass.author:
derek
constants for button states
button assets should use these values as frame labels for a particular state

field.name: OFF
field.description: Represents button state of 'off' (or mouse out)
field.shortDescription: Represents button state of 'off' (or mouse out)

field.name: ON
field.description: Represents button state of 'on' (or mouse over)
field.shortDescription: Represents button state of 'on' (or mouse over)

asClass.name: MouseWheelListener
asClass.author:
derek
Classes wishing to listen to be added as listeners of MouseWheel mouse wheel events should implement this

asClass.name: MouseWheelJSBridge
asClass.description: Class that wraps javascript code for providing cross platform MouseWheel support
asClass.shortDescription: Class that wraps javascript code for providing cross platform MouseWheel support

asClass.name: MouseOverHelper
asClass.author:
derek
This is a helper class for the MouseWheel class to notifiy MouseWheel whether mouse is currently over a target display object
Behaves in the way a rolled over sprite behaves i.e. can be obstructed by other display objects in front

method.name: toString
method.description: get string representation of this instance
method.shortDescription: get string representation of this instance

field.name: mouseIsOver
field.description: returns true if the mouse is rolled over the target
field.shortDescription: returns true if the mouse is rolled over the target

field.name: mouseTarget
field.description: get the target mouse over object
field.shortDescription: get the target mouse over object

asClass.name: MouseWheel
asClass.author:
derek
Utility to provide cross platform (Mac OS X) mousewheel support (requires javascript / ExternalInterface)

method.name: addMouseWheelListener
method.description: add a listener for MouseWheel events
method.shortDescription: add a listener for MouseWheel events

method.name: getInstance
method.description:
Get the MouseWheel instance
note you must call init() and pass a valid stage instance before MouseWheel will start working
method.shortDescription:
Get the MouseWheel instance
note you must call init() and pass a valid stage instance before MouseWheel will start working

param.name: stage
param.description: DisplayObject (mouse positions will be calculated relative to this)

method.name: lockBrowserScroll
method.description: prevent MouseWheel scrolling from scrolling the containing web page as well
method.shortDescription: prevent MouseWheel scrolling from scrolling the containing web page as well

param.name: lock
param.description: Boolean true to lock, false to unlock

method.name: removeMouseWheelListener
method.description: remove a listener for MouseWheel events
method.shortDescription: remove a listener for MouseWheel events
